description:
Can't see an option to add a shared folder or add a peer.
Also, an "application closed unexpectedly" dialog keeps appearing.
Don't have the time to spend investigating, need something that works. For that, the web ui does the job.
It's suddenly not working. All I get is a white screen with a title bar of synthing gtk. I've restarted the daemon over and over and tried the web interface. Nothing happens.

For those with a Steam Deck having a blank screen on Syncthing window.
Check that your port is available `ss -ntlp | grep 8081`, it must show nothing.

If used by `socat` process for debugging, disable the relevent service :
`sudo systemctl disable --now steam-web-debug-portforward`.

This is used by the Steam process for CEF Debugging (you can also see the command used).
You could do it through the Steam UI but it personally didn't work for me :

Developer > CEF Remote Debugging.

Was working great before. Now just shows a blank screen and deamon does not start or restart.
Happy to update review once this is changed.
Bessere Alternative: "dnf install syncthing" und dann "sudo systemctl enable --now syncthing@USER.service", Weboberfläche verfügbar unter localhost:8384
